abstract: David W. Dorman, former chief executive of AT&T, will become chairman of Motorola next month as the struggling company tries to fix its slumping fortunes by splitting in two.
lead_paragraph: David W. Dorman, former chief executive of AT&T, will become chairman of Motorola next month as the struggling company tries to fix its slumping fortunes by splitting in two.

headline.main: Ex-Chief Executive at AT&T to Be Motorola’s Chairman
